item.title: Idea to name the posts
item.description: How to name the files of the posts? I found a nice way to name the files of the posts for the blog. This is not the title of the post, the title is a field in the Markdown file. Initially I was using some sort of shortened title for the file name. I came across the blog post Write Code Like You Just Learned How to Program. I don’t think the post got to me, but I found the answer to my problem for the post file names.
